ygData.subject: Re: Glowing Stein -- SEMI SPOILER
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I think Allakahzam got some misinformation.  I have heard of many people who completed this quest (From brewers list, we learned long before others)  The
ygData.messageBody:
Vincent Archer wrote:

> From: Vincent Archer <Vincent.Archer@...>
>
> According to SPRUSBRUCE@...:
> > From: SPRUSBRUCE@...
> > Haha I got mine for free :P.......From my guild I gave them a fbr I got from
> > najena when we were camping jboots
>
> Well, be prepared for when Verant yanks the quest quickly because it's too
> easy (specially if, as Allakhazam says, a level 12 enchanter can do it).

I think Allakahzam got some misinformation. I have heard of many people who
completed this quest (From brewers list, we learned long before others) The only
successes so far have been from 20+ Enchanters (Illusion Ogre, Benevolence) and
very well factioned Ogres (Who purchased the ingridents from others). You need
to have Clurg above indifferent to get the item. The Euridin ingredient also
requires good Eurdite faction to complete that subquest. I also know
non-enchanter Dark elves and Druids in Wolf form who /conned indifferent to
Clurg, but were still refused the reward.
